common_questions.description_1: Registering your business and adding team members is free. You only pay for the services you order—just like on Fiverr.
common_questions.description_2: You can get a shortlist of handpicked freelancers from a dedicated Business Success Manager or just post a brief.
common_questions.description_3: Nope! A single account can be made for and shared by multiple users. Whether you’re working solo or collaborating with others, our vetted talent is available for all.
common_questions.description_4: Once you switch to a Fiverr Business account, it becomes your only default account. Everything will move with you, including previous searches, saved freelancers and inbox messages.
common_questions.description_5: Your existing balance will be refunded to your original payment method and your order history will move with you.
common_questions.description_6: Of course! You can deactivate your Fiverr Business account and go back to the Fiverr account. All of your information will be transferred as well.
common_questions.description_7: Every Fiverr Business freelancer has passed a multi-layered screening process combining AI and professional hand-vetting to cultivate your quality assurance.
common_questions.description_8: All of the saved freelancers will be available in the Freelancers page at the Navigation Bar, as well as within Lists.
common_questions.title_1: How much does Fiverr Business cost?
common_questions.title_2: How does Fiverr Business help me find the right freelancers?
common_questions.title_3: Is Fiverr Business for teams only?
common_questions.title_4: What happens to my original Fiverr account when I switch to business?
common_questions.title_5: What would happen to my orders existing balance?
common_questions.title_6: Can I switch back if I don’t like it?
common_questions.title_8: Will I be able to see the freelancers that I've saved in the past?

common_questions.description_1: Registering your business and adding team members is free. You only pay for the services you order—just like on Fiverr.
common_questions.description_2: You can get a shortlist of handpicked freelancers from a dedicated Business Success Manager or just post a brief.
common_questions.description_3: Nope! A single account can be made for and shared by multiple users. Whether you’re working solo or collaborating with others, our vetted talent is available for all.
common_questions.description_4: Once you switch to a Fiverr Business account, it becomes your only default account. Everything will move with you, including previous searches, saved freelancers and inbox messages.
common_questions.description_5: Your existing balance will be refunded to your original payment method and your order history will move with you.
common_questions.description_6: Of course! You can deactivate your Fiverr Business account and go back to the Fiverr account. All of your information will be transferred as well.
common_questions.description_7: Every Fiverr Business freelancer has passed a multi-layered screening process combining AI and professional hand-vetting to cultivate your quality assurance.
common_questions.description_8: All of the saved freelancers will be available in the Freelancers page at the Navigation Bar, as well as within Lists.
common_questions.title_1: How much does Fiverr Business cost?
common_questions.title_2: How does Fiverr Business help me find the right freelancers?
common_questions.title_3: Is Fiverr Business for teams only?

common_questions.title_6: Can I switch back if I don’t like it?
common_questions.title_8: Will I be able to see the freelancers that I've saved in the past?

paragraphs: Fiverr’s algorithm will associate terms you enter here with your Gig, and will showcase your Gig to potential buyers using these terms in their searches.

bullets: Special characters and duplicated terms will be ignored.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.why_should_i_q: Why should I translate my Gig? Doesn’t Fiverr already support multiple languages?
faq.why_should_i_a: Fiverr is a global marketplace. Without a provided translation, Buyers who browse Fiverr in other languages see machine-generated translations of your Gigs. By providing your own translation, you improve the quality and clarity of your Gigs and make it easier to attract local audiences who speak your language.
faq.why_cant_i_q: Why can’t I translate my Gig into other languages I speak?
faq.why_cant_i_a: We currently only support custom translations in German.
faq.should_i_do_q: Fiverr is allowing me to translate my Gig into a language that I don’t know very well. Should I do it?
faq.should_i_do_a: No. To make sure Buyers have a great experience, Gig translations should only be provided in languages you are actually comfortable writing and speaking.
faq.will_adding_hurt_q: Will adding a translation hurt my Gig visibility or performance?
faq.will_adding_hurt_a: Absolutely not! In fact, you may even see a boost to your Gig performance as it becomes more accessible to Buyers in local markets.
faq.how_can_i_q: How can I see how my Gig currently appears to non-English audiences?
faq.how_can_i_a: Sign out of Fiverr and visit your Gig page as a guest. Change Fiverr’s operating language in the site’s header or the footer. A button will appear at the top of the Gig inviting users to generate a machine translation of the page.
faq.original_gig_includes_q: My original Gig already includes non-English content. What should I do?
faq.original_gig_includes_a: Before custom translations were available, some sellers used multiple languages for their original Gig. Now that we have the right framework to translate your Gig, we recommend that you keep your original Gig in a single language, and manage translations through the Additional Languages tab. Please note: You are welcome to translate your Gig here without making any changes to the original.
faq.should_i_q: Should I keep the translation literal or can I add local flavor?
faq.should_i_a: Translations are always a mix of art and science. You should aim to keep your Gig content as identical to the source language as possible, but if a literal translation sounds funny or incorrect, you should tweak it to make it as attractive as possible to local audiences. Gigs should not offer differing terms or services  in different languages.
faq.can_i_change_q: Can I change the prices of my Gig for local audiences?
faq.can_i_change_a: No. Your Gig prices are set on the original Gig page, and will stay consistent across all languages.
faq.can_i_use_q: Can I use machine translation in order to translate my Gig?
faq.can_i_use_a: This feature is designed for Sellers to provide high-quality Gig translations in other languages they actually speak. Machine translations are not useful as they are already provided on-demand for non-native Buyers. All Gig translations are reviewed by Fiverr and low-quality translations will be removed.

dsa_trader_verification.upload_poa: Lastly, upload your proof of business
dsa_trader_verification.poa_clarification: This can be any government issued document that mentions your company name and address (electricity bill, bank statement, etc.)
dsa_trader_verification.supported_formats: Supported file formats: PDF, JPEG, PNG, BMP or TIFF.

trader_questionnaire.title: Personal & business information
trader_questionnaire.subtitle: Verify your personal and business information for compliance purposes. <t name="link">Learn more</t>

id_verification.subtitle: Next, let’s verify your identity
id_verification.disclaimer: Verifying your identity helps keep our Fiverr community safe. Grab your photo ID and phone, then follow the steps to keep selling on Fiverr.
id_verification.instruction: To start, scan the QR code or get a link via text message.
id_verification.alert: Once you finish verifying your ID on your mobile phone you'll need to head back here to finish up.
id_verification.privacy_note: Your privacy is important to us. We will never share your ID with other users. <t name='link'>Learn more</t>

errors.max_attempts_reached: Unfortunately, you've got no sms attempts left for now. Please try again in 24h or use QR code.
errors.phone_number_not_found: Failed to send sms, please try again.

proceed_to_payment.description: Based on the information you provided you’ll need to pay a small fee of ${amount} for your verification. This verification should only take a few minutes, and then you’ll be ready to start selling.
proceed_to_payment.note: Note: Make sure all your information is final, as you will not be able to make changes after paying.

disclaimer.description: We’ll need to verify some of your personal and business information for compliance purposes. This will come in handy along your Fiverr journey.
disclaimer.highlight: Only freelancers and agencies with this verification will get full exposure to all customers on Fiverr.

share_info.title: Share your information and documents
share_info.description: You’ll need an ID, payment method, mobile phone, and 5 minutes.

verify_info_control.title: We’ll verify your information
verify_info_control.description: This verification is free for a limited time only.

verify_info.title: We’ll verify your information
verify_info.description: This verification is quick and requires a one-time fee of ${amount}.

dsa_trader_verification.enter_business_details: Next, enter your business details. Make sure they’re identical to the details in your most recent business registration documents.
dsa_trader_verification.enter_individual_details: Enter your details as they appear on the ID that you’d like to verify in the next step. This can be a drivers license, passport, or ID card.
dsa_trader_verification.business_legal_agreement: By creating a Gig, I agree and undertake to only offer products and services that comply with applicable laws, including the European Union laws, and understand that some of this information such as name, address, email, phone and business registration number may be available to certain users. <t name='link'>Learn more</t>.

errors.phone_number_in_use: This phone is already linked to another Fiverr account

something_went_wrong.title: Something went wrong

AU.label: Do you have an ABN?
AU.tooltip: Your Australian business number identifies your business to the government and the community.

NZ.label: Do you have a GST number?
NZ.tooltip: You’ve registered for the Goods & Services Tax (GST) based on your annual sales turnover.

IN.label: Are you registered for India GST?
IN.tooltip: GST is a tax levied on the supply of goods and services.

QUEBEC.label: Are you registered for GST and/or QST?

AU.label: Enter your ABN
AU.tooltip: Your ABN is a unique 11-digit ID that identifies you to the government and community

NZ.label: Enter your GST number
NZ.tooltip: Your GST number is a unique 9-digit tax ID.

IL.label: VAT number
IL.tooltip: This is a registered tax ID number.

IN.label: GSTIN number
IN.tooltip: GSTIN is a unique 15-digit PAN-based ID issued to those registered for GST.

GST.label: Enter your GST number
GST.tooltip: A unique Goods & Services Tax (GST) ID issued by the Canadian Revenue Agency.

HST.label: Enter your HST number
HST.tooltip: A unique Harmonized Sales Tax (HST) ID issued by the Canadian Revenue Agency.

QUEBEC.label: Enter your GST number
QUEBEC.tooltip: A unique Goods & Services Tax (GST) ID issued by the Canadian Revenue Agency.

IN.label: PAN number
IN.tooltip: PAN is a unique 10-character ID issued to requestors.

IN.label: Are you a citizen/resident of India?
IN.tooltip:
Learn about tax criteria for India citizens and residents.
For citizens, learn more.
For residents, learn more.

IN.label: What is your ‘TCS under GST’ tax category?
IN.tooltip:
Taxable: You pay 1% TCS under GST.

Export: You pay 1% TCS under GST on services for buyers outside of India.

Reverse charge: You don’t pay TCS under GST, the buyer pays taxes.

Exempt: You don’t pay TCS under GST.

registered_for_invoice.description: I want to get invoices via email as well.

ca_qst_number.label: Enter your QST number

general.IN: Enter your state or union territory.
general.CA: Enter a valid Canada province or territory.

citizenship.header: Let’s check if you need to fill out Form W-9
citizenship.sub_header: Form W-9 is used in the U.S. for tax purposes. You are required to fill it out only if you’re defined as a U.S. person by the U.S. tax authorities. Answering ‘No’ completes the check.
citizenship.sub_header-completed: To stay compliant with U.S. tax regulations, please update your details with any change.
citizenship.explanation: What is a U.S. person (as defined by the U.S. tax authorities)?
citizenship.radio_button_no_info: I confirm that all the services I offer on Fiverr are performed while outside of the U.S.
citizenship.radio_button_yes_info: U.S. tax authorities might request Form W-9 and information regarding your activity on Fiverr.
citizenship.tax_regulation_info: Learn more about tax regulations and read our Privacy Policy to learn how we use your data.
citizenship.error_message: Click Yes or No to continue.

form-completed.title: Well done!
form-completed.paragraph: You’re good to go. You can update your information from your profile settings at any time if something has changed.

not-a-citizen.title: You’re done!
not-a-citizen.paragraph: No need to fill out Form W-9. You can update your information from your profile settings at any time.

us-person-explain.title: A  “U.S. person” is:
paragraph: A citizen or resident of the United States
Any estate other than a foreign estate

Any trust if: A court within the United States is able to exercise primary supervision over the administration of the trust, and one or more United States persons have the authority to control all substantial decisions of the trust
Any other person that is not a foreign person
us-person-explain.learn_more: Learn more about what a U.S. person is
